text: Hi all! Trying to learn Makie/GeoMakie. When I try `Figure()` I get a `ERROR: UndefVarError: Figure not defined` error when I try to run the basic example on GeoMakie github page with `Using GLMakie, GeoMakie`, etc.. What am I doing wrong for `Figure()`? Also: what function should I use to plot a bunch of geometry that are of type GeoInterface.LineString after I read in the GeoJSON?

text: `Figure` has been introduced in the latest version of `AbstractPlotting` you probably have a lower version (might be dependency blocking the update)

you probably have a lower version (might be dependency blocking the update)

text: Oh I see interesting, how do I check that? And how do I fix that?

text: Yep, it's just that noone tagged a new version of GeoMakie
